title: EUROPE RESEARCH ROUNDUP-BNP Paribas, Essilorluxottica SA , Senior Plc ,
text:
â€© July 1 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including BNP Paribas , Essilorluxottica SA and Senior Plc , on Thursday.

HIGHLIGHTS

* BNP Paribas : Deutsche Bank cuts to hold from buy

* CTP NV : Goldman Sachs cuts to neutral from buy

* Essilorluxottica SA : RBC cuts to sector perform from outperform

* Legal & General Group Plc : Credit Suisse raises to outperform from underperform

* Senior Plc : Peel Hunt raises to buy from hold

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Thursday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* 2Crsi SA : Portzamparc cuts target price to EUR 6.6 from EUR 7; rating buy

* AB Foods : Barclays raises target price to 3000p from 2800p

* AB Foods : Credit Suisse raises target price to 2710p from 2610p
